pkgmetadata.longdescription: Projection Visualization Plots for Dimensionally Reduced Data // Creates visualization plots for 2D projected data including ellipse plots, Voronoi diagram plots, and combined ellipse- Voronoi plots. Designed to visualize class separation in dimensionally reduced data from techniques like principal component analysis (PCA), partial least squares discriminant analysis (PLS-DA) or others. For more details see Lotsch and Ultsch (2024) doi:10.1016/j.imu.2024.101573.
